testcase.classname: F01_register|users could register with new accounts

testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "emy automation"..................................passed And user enter last name "tester"...........................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "testema@example.com" field............................passed And user fills Password field "P@ssw0rd3"...................................passed And user fills Confirm Password Field "P@ssw0rd3"...........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid email "test@example.com".........................passed And user login with valid password "P@ssw0rd"...............................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
